text: (ebævin mevæni avasthavanhi satya) visvasavantayin allahge margayehi (anivaryayenma) yuddha karannaha. pratiksepa karannan nam, (movunta viruddhava) seyitange margayehima yuddha karannaha. ebævin seyitange mituran samaga obat yuddha karanu. (ovunge pramanaya adhika vasayen tibima gæna sæka nositanu). niyata vasayenma seyitange kumantranaya itamat khelahinaya
